description: This file declares the omi::OmiProxy class, which implements the IOmiProxy interface with stub functions related to mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing listeners within the omi namespace.

classes.name: omi::OmiProxy
classes.description: A class that provides stub implementations for the IOmiProxy interface methods, related to bundle mounting and listener management.

methods.name: oms::OmiProxy()
methods.description: Default constructor for the OmiProxy class.

methods.name: ~omi::OmiProxy()
methods.description: Default destructor for the OmiProxy class.

methods.name: bool mountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)
methods.description: Stub method that intends to mount a crypted bundle; currently always returns true.

methods.name: bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string & id)
methods.description: Stub method that intends to unmount a crypted bundle; currently always returns true.

methods.name: long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener & listener,const void * cbParams)
methods.description: Stub method for registering an error listener; currently returns 0.

methods.name: void unregisterListener(long unsigned tag)
methods.description: Stub method for unregistering a listener; has an empty implementation.

ctags.name: mountCryptedBundle
ctags.signature: (const std::string & id,const std::string & rootfs_file_path,const std::string & config_json_path,std::string & bundlePath)

ctags.name: registerListener
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual long unsigned registerListener(const OmiErrorListener &listener, const void* cbParam/

ctags.name: umountCryptedBundle
ctags.pattern: /^    virtual bool umountCryptedBundle(const std::string& id) { return true; }$/
